# Login Setup Milestone - Task Breakdown

## Milestone: User Authentication & Login System

### Tasks

#### Backend Authentication

- [ ] Set up authentication service
- [ ] Implement JWT token management
- [ ] Create login API endpoint
- [ ] Create registration API endpoint
- [ ] Implement password hashing
- [ ] Add logout functionality
- [ ] Create password reset flow

#### Frontend Components

- [ ] Create login page component
- [ ] Create registration page component
- [ ] Create forgot password component
- [ ] Add form validation
- [ ] Implement authentication guard for routes
- [ ] Create authentication service
- [ ] Add token interceptor for HTTP requests

#### UI/UX

- [ ] Design login page UI
- [ ] Design registration page UI
- [ ] Add loading states
- [ ] Add error handling and messages
- [ ] Implement responsive design
- [ ] Add "Remember Me" functionality

#### Security

- [ ] Implement CSRF protection
- [ ] Add rate limiting
- [ ] Secure token storage
- [ ] Add session timeout
- [ ] Implement refresh token mechanism

#### Testing

- [ ] Unit tests for authentication service
- [ ] Component tests for login/registration
- [ ] E2E tests for authentication flow
- [ ] Security testing

---

## Instructions to Create Milestone on GitHub

1. Go to: https://github.com/hozefam/HabbitTracker/milestones
2. Click "New milestone"
3. Title: `User Authentication & Login System`
4. Due date: Set your target date
5. Description: Copy the tasks above
6. Click "Create milestone"

Then create individual issues for each task and assign them to this milestone.
